summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hotel Room Reservation System. Backend APIs working perfectly with all 11 tests passed. Frontend UI functional with proper room display, booking algorithm, and user interactions. Minor input validation UI issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: No error message displayed when user enters >5 rooms (backend correctly rejects but UI doesn't show feedback)

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Booking algorithm with travel time optimization
Frontend room display and floor labels
action_item_for_main_agent: Add error message display in frontend when user enters invalid number of rooms (>5 or <1). Currently backend validates correctly but UI doesn't show user feedback.
